amendment.description: To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of executive agency activities and functions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1964 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1964 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S13124; text: CR S13124) To limit the use of funds for converting to contractor performance of executive agency activities and functions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1964 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1964 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Collins.
